channel.title: Shows on Isaac Tay - Startups by Day, Standup by Night

item.title: Get with the Program @ The Merry Lion
item.description: First hour-long show ever. Startups by Day, Standup by Night. Suaku, Kiasu, Kaisee - in 2019, Isaac travelled from Singapore to London by land on buses and trains. Isaac claims it’s only a mid-life crisis if he lives to 76. Presenting his never-before-seen hour-long comedy special, Get with the Program is about growing up in Singapore and all the misadventures in learning how to live.
